item.title: How to Add Api Rate Limits to Your Express Api
item.description: I had an idea of building a public API, sort of similar to the Marvel API, where you get to fetch all Marvel characters. When I was brainstorming on how I would build the API, I thought about three key things: * It should be public and everyone should access (take note) * An admin account to allow me to update the API’s content. The problem with making it public as it would be quite risky especially when someone runs a bot that results in DDoS attack happens and well the API will be free and I will be paying for the server costs.
